attributes.action: Stop giving more Foreign Aid when some of out own kids/pensioners starve
attributes.additional_details:
We already give billions each year in foreign aid and have to suffer the numerous ads on TV every day.
Meantime our economy is broken-food banks abound-pensioners find it hard to make ends meet and we have child poverty in this country.
When will our 'as....'leaders wake up and smell the coffee?
I include all 3 career leaders who have never had job in the real world
